long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension is not endorsed by, associated or affiliated with Prolific! Please install "Prolific Assistant" instead if you are looking for the official extension.

With this extension, you won't miss your studies anymore. It informs you with sound and a toast notification when you receive a study or a message from a researcher on Prolific.

üìå It's advised to keep a Prolific tab always pinned because Prolific Enhancer only works if Prolific is open.

üîß Customizations
The primary feature of the extension is to send notifications, while there are many customizations available through the settings page, for example:
- Dark mode
- Easy tab pinning with a button
- Displaying balance in the navbar
- Auto-copying your Prolific id when you open a study
- Automatically cashing out when available
- Viewing detailed info about your account
- Other QOL features aimed towards improving your experience with Prolific.

üìà Statistics
Additionally, Prolific Enhancer keeps track of the studies you received and shows various statistics in the extension popup.

üîê Your data
Strictly no data is collected. You can, however, voluntarily submit error reports when something goes wrong.

---------------------------------------

Have a question, or you ran into a problem? 
Feel free to write to the contact email provided under "Contact the publisher"
